pkgmetadata.longdescription: Geometrically Inspired Multivariate Changepoint Detection // Implements the high-dimensional changepoint detection method GeomCP and the related mappings used for changepoint detection. These methods view the changepoint problem from a geometrical viewpoint and aim to extract relevant geometrical features in order to detect changepoints. The geomcp() function should be your first point of call. References: Grundy et al. (2020) doi:10.1007/s11222-020-09940-y.
